div.div: Macalester College vs. St. Norbert College
at De Pere, Wis. | Schneider Stadium

tr.td: Macalester wins toss and defers. St. Norbert receive north end.
Henry Chaussee kickoff 57 yards to the SNC08, Ryan Grandlic return 23 yards to the SNC31 (Dane Ku Blake).
St. Norbert College drive start at 15:00.
J.T. Crosby rush for 3 yards to the SNC34 (Jacob Simons).
Elijah Fort rush for 5 yards to the SNC39 (Sean Hayes).
J.T. Crosby rush for 3 yards to the SNC42 (Sean Hayes).
J.T. Crosby rush for 4 yards to the SNC46 (AJ Imholte).
Elijah Fort rush for 1 yard to the SNC47 (Phil Wettersten).
Jeff Allen punt 28 yards to the MAC25, fair catch by Cash McGregor.
Matt Glasenapp punt 75 yards to the SNC00, touchback.

S. Staehling rush for loss of 2 yards to the SNC18 (Liam Peebles; Phil Wettersten).
